body:
You knew It was going to happen eventually, You knew that  that one  Dragon My Balls Z and NaruToes fan boy weeaboo  was going to ask for it.


So. ADD ANIMEZ CHAT ON DISCORD. I know dat some people like the bonzi buddy here Dev_Revs wont approve of this, Idc cuz Kawaii is c00l. NO ONE CARES WUT U THINK DEVON jk kappa . Jeez. 

Anyways, Me and people like JumbKCM need dis chat to feed our anime needs. Plus I'm banned from most anime discords cuz I kept spamming that Minato is obv better then Shippuden Kakashi,(HE IS1)

Also that Jason needed more character development in Tokyo Ghoul, He died 2 quick.

 

Anyways, WE NEED ANIME CHAT ON DISCORD I MEAN, OCN HAD IT, Thats the driving force that kept OCN alive. Duh,


Anyways THIS IS THE END OF THE POST



~CL1CKIN















Kappa

replies.body:
NO!

RID THE WORLD OF ANIME!

​Atdit's famous 5 steps to free yourself from Anime!

1) Watch anime less often. If you watch 1 or 2 episodes a day, lower them to 1 per day or 3-4 per week.

2) Watch other series, it doesn't matter what. I recommend Spongebob because it's waking up good old memories.

3) Delete everything which is related to anime on your PC. This includes all anime pictures, wallpapers, and even your 1TB hentai collection. Delete it.

4) After lowering your anime dose, keep it for a while like this, and then lower it again; try to stop watching anime one and for all at some point.

5) Get a real girlfriend so you have another reason not to watch Anime.

Good luck!

replies.body:
Then their is someone like you. 

The average stereotypical person who thinks that Anime is made of  socially awkward people  that have Body Pillows and have posters and call people -chan and -kun. Ridding the world of anime wouldn't do any good. It's the exact same thing as other cartoons. Heck theirs some people that are h00ked on Spongebob. People think that Anime lovers sit in their couch everyday and watch Crunchyroll or something like that.  You are saying like every Anime lover is the same, that every anime lover watches anime alot, only watches anime, Has anime pictures and wallpapers, and have alot of hentai, You even say that Anime lovers dont have a real girlfriend as your implying to get a REAL Girlfriend, do you think that anime lovers have fake anime girls as a girlfriend? Very stereotypical. ANd you are also saying to get a girlfriend, implying that anime lovers dont have a girlfriend or a fake girlfriend.




I know your a internet troll but do you have to be stereotypical about anime, Sure you can say I'm wasting my time talking to this internet troll, but its the truth. Pretty much what your saying right now is implying  to others,  "to free yourself from Anime".  Thats saying me and others. 


Anyways, just stop judging others on your own preconceptions. Even if your not saying things to other, you are saying it to me. Which offends me. Jeez. 








Kappa  I dont really care what you say but if you say that to a Anime Subreddit, ur gunna get attacked lol XD

replies.body:
LOL Wikipedia is not informative as other users can edit the text. Maybe YOU edited it. Or someone who hates Anime. 
Anime cant cause cancer. That's almost impossible. "anal fist guys". Doesn't seem professional for a Wikipedia page.
You were probably butthurt for a source so you made your own. 

Even more evidence this was photoshoped or edited is the fact that Never does this appear in the official Anime Wikipedia page.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anime

So what If i am triggered, still doesn't compete with the fact that you used a source from Wikipedia. \

Funny because you were probably triggered when I made a forum post about a Anime Chat On Discord, then you decided to bash on it with stereotypes.

Anyways I'm done with this Internet beef you Internet Tr0ll.
